job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout the teamltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtzillow offers is an initiative at the core of zillows evolution focused on defining the future of real estate our business seeks to make it simple to buy and sell homes by giving consumers certainty and control and sparing them the tremendous stress of the traditional processltbrgtltbrgtwe are a collaborative passionate team of applied scientists machine learning engineers software engineers ampamp product managers building the machine learning software that serve as the backbone of the zillow offers productltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for a machine learning engineer who will join the engineering group for the automated valuation model team responsible for creating automated explainable and unbiased home valuations this high impact team provides our customers with an accurate offer for their home these automated valuations are at the core of our vision of providing consumers with an always uptodate fairmarketvalue cash offer for their homeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtabout the roleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtin this ltstronggtmachine learning engineerltstronggt role you will partner closely with applied scientists to realize new research breakthroughs in a robust scalable way you will ltstronggtbuild and deploy machine learningbased softwareltstronggt including data engineering pipelines machine learning workflows and inference microservicesltbrgtltbrgtwe are seeking a ltstronggtpassionate selfstarter ltstronggtwho is equally versed in software engineering best practices and the latest technologies and frameworks for deploying machine learning modelsltbrgtltbrgtideally you are interested in growing your machine learning engineering leadership and enjoy being in a fastpaced ambiguous environment this role will collaborate with a team that includes applied scientists data scientists and a product manager you will start remotely due to covidltbrgtltbrgtour team is excited for this ltstronggtkey hireltstronggt to join our mission we have committed significant time systems and processes to onboard you in an inclusive and empowering way if this message resonates with you please applyltbrgtltbrgtthis role has been categorized as a remote position remote employees do not have a permanent corporate office workplace and instead work from a physical location of their choice which must be identified to the company employees may live in any of the us states with limited exceptions in certain cases an employee in a remotedesignated job may need to live in a specific region or time zone to support customers or clients as part of their roleltbrgtltbrgtwho you areltbrgtltulgtltligtrealworld experience building and deploying machine learning andor data systems for example data engineering pipeline for data ingestion and feature extraction machine learning workflow for automatically training and evaluating models a web service for dynamic online inferenceltligtltligtwe largely use python but fluency in scala java andor c is also acceptableltligtltligtfamiliarity with python scientific stack eg numpy pandasltligtltligtexperience working with cloud platforms eg aws gcp azure to ship intelligent systemsltligtltligtpassion for machine learning engineering and zillow offersltligtltligtselfstarter who takes initiative receives feedback well and has a positive attitudeltbrgtltligtltulgtnicetohavesltbrgtltulgtltligtexperience supporting and collaborating with scientistsltligtltligtexperience working with product managers real estate partners andor platform teams infrastructure data engineering etcltligtltligtexperience working at a large technology company with various stakeholders and decision makersltligtltligtexperience building data pipelines with distributed processing frameworks eg apache sparkltligtltligtexperience championing best practices in ml opsltbrgtltligtltulgtin addition to a competitive base salary this position is also eligible for equity awards based on factors such as experience performance and locationltbrgtltbrgtget to know usltbrgtltbrgtzillow is reimagining real estate to make it easier to unlock lifes next chapterltbrgtltbrgtas the mostvisited real estate website in the united states zillow and its affiliates offer customers an ondemand experience for selling buying renting or financing with transparency and nearly seamless endtoend service millions of people visit zillow and its affiliate sites every month to start their home search and now they can rely on zillow to help them finish it and no matter what job youre in you will play a critical role in making this vision a realityltbrgtltbrgtat zillow were powered by our innovative and inclusive work culture where everyone has the flexibility support and resources to do the best work of their careers our efforts to streamline the real estate transaction is supported by our passion to redefine the employee experience a deeprooted culture of innovation a fundamental commitment to equity and belonging and ltugtworldclass benefitsltugt but dont just take our word for it read our reviews on ltugtglassdoorltugt and recent recognition from multiple organizations including ltugtfortunes best companies to work for list ltugt bloomberg genderequality index human rights campaign hrc corporate equity index and hrcs best place to work for lgbtq equality fortune best workplaces for technology fortune best workplaces for millennials fortune best workplaces for parents and the deloitte technology fast ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtzillow group is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive innovative environment with the best employees we are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race color ancestry religion sex national origin sexual orientation age citizenship marital status disability gender identity or veteran status if you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation please contact us at recruitingaccessibilityzillowgroupcomltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtapplicants who receive job offers from zillow group will be asked to sign a
